entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow ending early this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clearing near midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 60 percent chance of light snow late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023
